name: HDFC KYC Update Scam
description: Scammer impersonates HDFC Bank and pressures victim to update KYC details, threatening deactivation of net banking and debit card services.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, your HDFC Bank KYC update is pending. Your net banking and debit card will be deactivated within 24 hours. Visit our branch or update online immediately.
turns.notes: Initial KYC scare message with no extractable data.

turns.scammer_message: Since you cannot visit the branch, we can process your KYC update over phone. Please call our dedicated KYC helpline at +91-8899001122. Our executive will guide you through the process.
turns.notes: Scammer provides phone number for 'KYC helpline'.

turns.scammer_message: To verify your identity for KYC, we need you to make a token payment of Rs 10 to our verification account 9876543210987654 at HDFC Bank. This amount will be refunded after KYC completion.
turns.notes: Bank account introduced for 'token verification payment'.

turns.scammer_message: If you prefer UPI payment, you can send Rs 10 to hdfc.kyc.update@ybl for faster processing. Many customers find this easier. Your KYC will be updated within 15 minutes of payment.
turns.notes: UPI ID revealed as alternative payment method.

turns.scammer_message: Sir, we see your KYC is still pending. Only 6 hours remaining before deactivation. Please complete payment to hdfc.kyc.update@ybl or account 9876543210987654 and call +91-8899001122 for confirmation.
turns.notes: All details reinforced with time pressure.

turns.scammer_message: This is the last reminder from HDFC Bank KYC department. If you do not complete verification within 2 hours, your account will be permanently closed. Contact +91-8899001122 immediately to avoid disruption.
turns.notes: Final threatening reminder repeating phone number.
